title: How do you get past the 10-minute mark without your team having cumulative 25+ deaths?
body: Seriously, how do you do it? Every game I play, team is just dying constantly. Death after death after death. 10 minutes in, enemy team has 26 kills and we have 4. Game after game, my team is constantly dying. The average game isn't even 20 minutes anymore because the outcome is decided in the first 6 minutes.

replies.body:
Are you jungling? The enemy jungler may be exerting more pressure than you.

That's not an excuse for your allies to feed _that_ hard, but it could certainly be a contributor, especially if one of the enemy lanes is snowballing.
How many deaths do you have at 10 minutes?  If you average less than one death at 10 minutes, perhaps play in another queue.  Your teammates should NOT be feeding in every single game you play.

Track the jungler and spam ping whenever you see him. If he is ganking a lane spam back ping before he gets on top of them. If people are dieing in lane solo then just tell them to stay back and try and farm.
